    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackedView

        public TrackedView(MarkerBoard board)

      • TrackedView

        public TrackedView(PaperScreen paperScreen)
        Create a TrackedView of the size of the PaperScreen. The default capture size in millimeters is the size of the paperScreen). The default pixel size is 1px / millimeter, so identical to the capture size. You can change these values before calling the init() method.
        Parameters:
        paperScreen -

        public TrackedView()
